entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#StayTFHome y‚Äôall. Please, since Jared Polis can‚Äôt seem to find 1 in 100 people positive for #coronavirus a valid enough reason to issue the order please just #staytfhome as if we have real leadership that governs as if they value our lives.

Hospitalizations from COVID-19 have reached an all-time high in Colorado, Gov. Polis and state health officials said Thursday.

entry.title: All love and all power to the people of Tigray....
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

All love and all power to the people of Tigray. #AllBlackLivesMatter #Tigraywillprevail

Ethiopia mobilised for war in the northern Tigray region on Thursday, dashing international hopes of averting a conflict between Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed's government and the powerful ethnic faction that led the ruling coalition for decades.

reuters.com

Ethiopia mobilises for war in northern region

Ethiopia mobilised for war in the northern Tigray region on Thursday, dashing international hopes of averting a conflict between Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed's government and the powerful ethnic faction that led the ruling coalition for decades.Ethiopia mobilised for war in the northern Tigray region on Thursday, dashing international hopes of averting a conflict between Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed's government and the powerful ethnic faction that led the ruling coalition for decades.

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Nicole Murayama Nirthe sooner we get over (work through) the disappointment or grief that this country is both rooted...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280Nicole Murayama Nir

the sooner we get over (work through) the disappointment or grief that this country is both rooted in racism and still moves in racist ways on a national and in...ternational level, the sooner we can show up in support of many decades and even centuries of anti racist work.

none of this news is new, babes. we didn't need an election to prove or affirm it. wipe your tears and connect with mutual aid groups in your area.

entry.title: Black Lives Matter 5280NowThisBLM ACTIVIST IN CONGRESS: Cori Bush, a formerly homeless working class activist, has been elected to the U.S....
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280NowThis

BLM ACTIVIST IN CONGRESS: Cori Bush, a formerly homeless working class activist, has been elected to the U.S. House to represent Missouri‚Äôs 1st Congressional Di...strict. The nurse and single mother was an early leader in the Black Lives Matter protests in Ferguson. In an August primary, she upset a sitting Democratic congressperson whose family had held the seat for more than 50 years. Bush is the first Black woman to serve in the U.S. House from Missouri.

See MoreSee the latest updates on the 2020 US Election. See Election Updates

entry.title: ‚ñ∂
#DEMANDS...
entry.content:
#DEMANDS
Immediately fire and revoke the pensions of the officers that murdered Breonna.
Divest from LMPD and Invest in community building
Immediate resignation (or impeachment) of Mayor Greg Fisher
Metro Council ends use of force by Louisville Metro Police Department.
Police shootings are gun violence.
A local, civilian community police accountability council that is independent from the Mayor’s Office and LMPD with investigation and discipline power #CPAC.
The creation of policy to ensure transparent investigation processes
#JusticeforBre #SayHerName
#DefundPolice #DefendBlackLife #KeepGoing #BlackLivesMatterLouisville #JusticeForBreonnaTaylor #InvestDivest

entry.title: On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate....
entry.content:
On #SexWorkerPrideDay this Sunday, September 13th we celebrate.
We celebrate sex workers’ self-determination.
We celebrate sex workers’ enhanced visibility.
We celebrate the achievements of sex worker led organizations.
We celebrate and we keep the fight for decriminalization going until it is won.
#Sexworkiswork#decriminalizesexwork

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
